text: Pak Doo-Ik (; Hanja: 朴斗翼; born 17 March 1942) is a North Korean professional athlete. He is best known as an association football player. He was a member of the North Korean national team. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:North Korean footballers Category:People from Pyongyang
title: Pak Doo-Ik
